description:
Updated to fix webOS 2 issues

UPDATE INFO BELOW. Please email me if you have an issue or find a bug in the application.

WeatherIcon will Change its Icon showing the current weather conditions and the temperature, put it in the "launch bar" and you have the weather at you fingertips without opening an app. you can check the weather by just bringing up the "wave bar" while doing almost anything (watching a clip etc..).
HOW TO GET THE ICON INTO WAVE BAR: YOU MUST FIRST REMOVE AN ICON FROM THE WAVE BAR, TO DO SO YOU MUST OPEN THE LAUNCHER, ALL ICONS CAN BE MOVED BY HOLDING THEM FOR A SECOND THEY THEN "LIGHT UP" AND CAN BE MOVED AROUND.
